info.name: SSI Securities Corporation
info.description: SSI Securities Corporation provides financial products and services in Vietnam. The company offers securities products and services, including account opening, brokerage, order placing, advisory, cash transactions, securities depository, and consultancy and support for OTC transactions; distribution of open-ended fund certificates, ETFs, certificates of deposit and corporate bond; initial public offering, and coverage warrants auction house; trades in covered warrants; and financial, e-trading, research and investment, and wealth management services for individual clients. It engages in investing in equity, bond, fund certificate, and derivative; treasury services; and investment banking activities comprising corporate financing, merger and acquisitions, and advisory for capital raising in domestic and international markets. In addition, the company provides asset management services, including fund and portfolio management, and investment advisory services. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
